## Public Member Functions

### allUsesReplacedWith() {#a1e2c302e5be1c52548682f51a085b972}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;LazyValueInfo.cpp&#125;::LVIValueHandle::allUsesReplacedWith (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Callback for Value RAUW.

Called when this-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valuehandlebase/#a7d6d2457c839e340266704440f3bb243">getValPtr()</a>-&gt;replaceAllUsesWith(new&#95;value) is called, <em>before</em> any of the uses have actually been replaced. If WeakTrackingVH were implemented as a CallbackVH, it would use this method to call setValPtr(new&#95;value). AssertingVH would do nothing in this method.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/lazyvalueinfo-cpp/#l00100">100</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/lazyvalueinfo-cpp">LazyValueInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### deleted() {#a04c692693c243dd89dd5909448d49159}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void LVIValueHandle::deleted ()"
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Callback for Value destruction.

Called when this-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valuehandlebase/#a7d6d2457c839e340266704440f3bb243">getValPtr()</a> is destroyed, inside ~Value(), so you may call any non-virtual Value method on <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valuehandlebase/#a7d6d2457c839e340266704440f3bb243">getValPtr()</a>, but no subclass methods. If WeakTrackingVH were implemented as a CallbackVH, it would use this method to call setValPtr(NULL). AssertingVH would use this method to cause an assertion failure.

All implementations must remove the reference from this object to the Value that&#39;s being destroyed.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/lazyvalueinfo-cpp/#l00099">99</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/lazyvalueinfo-cpp">LazyValueInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
